content: Be sure to cross the bridge to find the Brook of Bliss Shrine, and you can circle back to the top of the brook to find another Thunder Rhino Master patrolling near a Cyan Bat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to cross the bridge to find the Brook of Bliss Shrine, and you can circle back to the top of the brook to find another Thunder Rhino Master patrolling near a Cyan Bat.
